Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory801.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: "The new snack shop is selling Lovers' Delights! They're a rare find, so Watanabe and you grab a bag each."}
{2: "Never thought I'd find such traditional snacks here.", 3: '6'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "They must have timed their trial opening with Valentine's Day, huh?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Perfect, since the children have never seen these snacks before. Let's take some back for them to try.", 4: '1'}
{3: "The paper bag in your arms holds golden-baked Lovers' Delights, the scent of flour and eggs mingling and wafting into your nostrils."}
{2: "I'm starting to get hungry.", 3: '10'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Want to try one first?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe picks up a piece of snack and brings it to your lips.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'How is it?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Not bad. Want one?', 3: '15'}
{3: 'You take a piece from the bag and hand it to Watanabe.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'They even stuffed it with... date paste, of all things.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After confirming the taste, you plop down on a bench by the road, and he offers you another piece.'}
{3: "So, under Watanabe's watchful gaze, you take a big bite, just like before."}
{3: 'The anticipated satisfaction never materializes, leaving a weird aftertaste instead.'}
{3: 'The act of chewing slowly becomes a battle against the assault on your taste buds.'}
{3: 'Watanabe senses something is wrong and glances at the remaining half of the snack.'}
{3: 'The filling is slick with oil, thankfully the contents are still identifiable.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'What is this... minced meat and tofu? And Sichuan pepper? What kind of bizarre combination is this?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "What's this red stuff... chili? What a waste of perfectly good food.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Hey, maybe you shouldn't eat that... wait a minute...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Want to spit it out?! There's a trash bin over there...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The disparate flavors explode on your tongue, finally giving meaning to that notion of experiencing every flavor in one bite.'}
{3: 'With the willpower honed on the Star of Life, you swallow hard.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "If it's bad, don't force it down... Is it because I mentioned food waste?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Food waste is definitely a bad thing...', 3: '35', 4: '(Nod)', 5: '35'}
{3: 'Watanabe, while patting your back with a frown, takes the paper bag from you, finally noticing the small characters printed on the back.'}
{3: '"Lovers\' Delights on sale at 30% off, explore hidden flavors to exchange for a commemorative coin!"'}
{3: 'Pinching the bottom of the paper bag, several round commemorative coins poke through.'}
{2: 'How many hidden flavors did that clerk sneak in?', 3: '40'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'No wonder his smile was so strange, it almost gave me the creeps, like something was about to go down on the battlefield.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Shaking the bag, you both fall silent, staring at the coins at the bottom.'}
{2: 'Could the kids even handle this kind of test?', 3: '43'}
{3: 'Watching you sweat in thought, Watanabe suddenly chuckles, patting you on the shoulder.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Ah well, let the kids experience a challenge beyond the surprise, too.', 4: '1'}
